mapper.select: select l.code,l.lost_date,l.kind,l.item,l.info,p.placeid,p.depplace,p.addr,p.tel,l.photo from p_lost l, p_place p where p.placeid=l.placeid and p.placeid=#{placeid}
select lost_date,kind,item,info,photo from p_lost where code=#{code}
select l.photo, l.state, l.code,l.lost_date,l.kind,l.item,l.info,p.depplace,p.addr,p.tel from s_lost l, s_place p where p.tel=l.tel and p.tel=#{placeid}
